reviews.review_msg: I regret taking this class. I still don't know how development works, but now I know that most of it is done poorly. The TA (Sonia) graded 75% of our mark, and was very tough and difficult. The workload resembled an upper division course. Gretchen was disorganized, often late, and even no-showed for a class once. Do not take this as an elective.
